api_list.name: Annotation Details
api_list.description:
An annotation is a piece of content about a part of a document. The document may be a song (hosted on Genius) or a web page (hosted anywhere). The part of a document that an annotation is attached to is called a referent.

Annotation data returned from the API includes both the substance of the annotation and the necessary information for displaying it in its original context.

optional_parameters.name: text_format
optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

api_list.name: Web Page Lookup
api_list.description:
A web page is a single, publicly accessible page to which annotations may be attached. Web pages map 1-to-1 with unique, canonical URLs.

Information about a web page retrieved by the page's full URL (including protocol). The returned data includes Genius's ID for the page, which may be used to look up associated referents with the /referents endpoint.

Data is only available for pages that already have at least one annotation.

optional_parameters.name: text_format
optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

optional_parameters.name: og_url
optional_parameters.description: The URL as specified by an og:url <meta> tag in a page's <head>

optional_parameters.name: canonical_url
optional_parameters.description: The URL as specified by an appropriate <link> tag in a page's <head>

api_list.name: Referents
api_list.description:
Referents are the sections of a piece of content to which annotations are attached. Each referent is associated with a web page or a song and may have one or more annotations. Referents can be searched by the document they are attached to or by the user that created them.

Referents by content item or user responsible for an included annotation.

You may pass only one of song_id and web_page_id, not both.

optional_parameters.name: web_page_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a web page to get referents for

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Paginated offset, (e.g., per_page=5&page=3 returns songs 11–15)

optional_parameters.name: created_by_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a user to get referents for

optional_parameters.name: song_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a song to get referents for

optional_parameters.name: text_format
optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per request

api_list.name: Artist Details
api_list.description: An artist is how Genius represents the creator of one or more songs (or other documents hosted on Genius). It's usually a musician or group of musicians.

optional_parameters.name: text_format
optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: The search capability covers all content hosted on Genius (all songs).

api_list.name: Song Details
api_list.description:
A song is a document hosted on Genius. It's usually music lyrics.

Data for a song includes details about the document itself and information about all the referents that are attached to it, including the text to which they refer.

optional_parameters.name: text_format
optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

api_list.name: Album Details

optional_parameters.name: text_format
optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

api_list.name: Multi Search
api_list.description: The multi search capability covers all content hosted on Genius (all sections).

optional_parameters.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per request
